statements: UPDATE user_interaction_data SET app_version='2.0' WHERE user_id='12345'
UPDATE user_interaction_data SET interaction_type='click' WHERE device_id='6789'
UPDATE user_interaction_data SET app_version = '2.0', interaction_timestamp = '2022-03-15 12:30:00' WHERE user_id = '12345';
UPDATE user_interaction_data SET interaction_type = 'click', device_id = 'XYZ123', app_version = '1.5' WHERE user_id = '54321';
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE interactions SET timestamp='2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE users SET username = 'Alice', email = 'alice@example.com' WHERE user_id = '1234';
UPDATE interactions SET action = 'Commented', timestamp = '2022-03-15' WHERE interaction_id = '5678';
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_type = 'like' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE ar_applications SET app_name = 'AR App 2', app_description = 'An augmented reality application' WHERE app_id = 456;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_type = 'like' WHERE user_id = 123456 AND interaction_time > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE ar_applications SET app_description = 'An amazing AR app for designing interior spaces' WHERE app_id = 789 AND app_name = 'DecorAR';
UPDATE user_data SET interaction_type = 'tap', interaction_timestamp = '2022-10-12 09:30:00' WHERE user_id = 1001;
UPDATE user_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great app, loved the graphics!', rating = 5 WHERE user_id = 2003 AND AR_app_id = 5002;
UPDATE user_data SET interaction_type='click', interaction_timestamp='2022-08-15 12:30:00', device_id=101, AR_app_id=201 WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE user_feedback SET feedback_text='Great app!', rating=5, user_id=3, AR_app_id=202 WHERE feedback_id=2;
UPDATE user_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great job!' WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE ar_applications SET app_name = 'New AR App' WHERE app_id = 5;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_type = 'Like' WHERE user_id = 101 AND interaction_id = 150;
UPDATE ar_applications SET app_category = 'Education', app_name = 'AR Math' WHERE app_id = 201;
